resources.string: Azalea Room You\'ll be in a good mood every time you enter this garden-themed room. A queen-size bed, air conditioning, in-room movies, a dinette, a dresser, a bathtub, a hot and cold shower, a hair dryer, and a safety deposit box are among the amenities.

Japanese Room This themed room, created with the same precision and passion that made Japanese ingenuity famous worldwide, provides comfort and convenience through excellent appointments and standard amenities. A twin-size bed, air conditioning, an LED TV with cable channels, in-room movies, and a hot and cold shower are among the amenities.

Deluxe Room The Premium Room is ideal for solo travelers and couples who don\'t need much space. The room is small and cozy, with a twin-size bed, air conditioning, an LED TV with cable channels and in-room movies, and a hot and cold shower
